attacks.name: Emerald Break
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: M Rayquaza-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

cards.name: Giovanni's Scheme
text: Choose 1: •Draw cards until you have 5 cards in your hand. •During this turn, your Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Giant Water Shuriken
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may discard a Water Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 6 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Greninja BREAK
text: Greninja BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

cards.name: Parallel City
text: Choose which way this card faces before you play it. Any damage done by attacks from this ↓ player's Grass, Fire, or Water Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance). Choose which way this card faces before you play it. This ↓ player can't have more than 3 Benched Pokémon. (When this card comes into play, this ↓ player discards Benched Pokémon until he or she has 3 Pokémon on the Bench.)

ability.name: Strong Cheer
ability.text: Your Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't apply more than 1 Strong Cheer Ability at a time.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

ability.name: Almighty Evolution
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put any Stage 1 card from your hand onto this Pokémon to evolve it. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

cards.name: Ditto ◇
text: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

cards.name: Cedric Juniper
text: Put a Pokémon from your hand face down in front of you and tell your opponent its name. Your opponent guesses the height of that Pokémon. Reveal that Pokémon. If your opponent guessed right, he or she draws 3 cards. If your opponent guessed wrong, you draw 3 cards. Return the Pokémon to your hand. (You can't choose a Pokémon that doesn't have the height printed on the card.)

cards.name: Jamming Net Team Flare Hyper Gear
text: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 20 less damage to all Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) When this card is removed from a Pokémon for any reason, put this card in its owner's discard pile.

cards.name: Lance ◇
text: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

ability.name: Trade
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Riotous Beating
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Trickster-GX
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Zoroark-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

ability.name: Excitable Draw
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, shuffle your hand into your deck and then draw 6 cards. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

cards.name: Robo Substitute Team Flare Gear
text: Play this card as if it were a 30 HP Colorless Basic Pokémon. At any time during your turn (before your attack), you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat. If this card is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take any Prize cards for it.

ability.name: Primal Winds
ability.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Basic Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless more.

attacks.name: Wild Dive-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Aerodactyl-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Beacon
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

ability.name: Wonder Tag
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Energy Drive
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon. This damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Tapu Cure-GX
attacks.text: Heal all damage from 2 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Tapu Lele-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

ability.name: Set Up
ability.text: Once during your turn, when you put Uxie from your hand onto your Bench, you may draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Psychic Restore
attacks.text: You may put Uxie and all cards attached to it on the bottom of your deck in any order.

ability.name: Mighty Shield
ability.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from each of your opponent's Pokémon that has Special Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Slash Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Overpowering Fang
ability.text: As long as Feraligatr ex is your Active Pokémon, each player's Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) can't use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sore Spot
attacks.text: Does 70 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

cards.name: Feraligatr ex
text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Jet Draft
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Aerodactyl
text: Put this card onto your Bench only with the effect of Old Amber Aerodactyl
